segments.text: Mr . Tang , we have decided to hire you . How much do you expect to get a month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm making three thousand yuan a month at my present work . I should not , of course , make a change for less . Could you provide me with a monthly salary of four thousand yuan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don â€™ t think we can give you that much as the starting salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , Mr . Allen , Nowadays this starting salary is not high based on my skills and experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe , but there are many fringe benefits here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Additional to medical benefits , we also offer a rent free house and the use of a car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I have my own car and my own house .
segments.speaker: S2
